item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule is the placement rule that a virtual guest placement group follows. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule Service Datatype Description This data type presents the structure of a virtual guest placement group rule. Local id The placement group rule's associated unique ID. Type: integer keyName The placement group rule's key name. Type: string name The placement group rule's name. Type: string

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule::getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule record. Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_RuleInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_RuleObjectMask SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_RuleObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup_Rule
